document.full_text: foxconn technology co ltd on sunday confirmed that a third person has died following a large explosion at a plant in southwestern china on friday that local media have linked to production of apple's ipad 2.
document.title: foxconn confirms 3rd death at plant linked to ipad
lines_and_colors: foxconn technology co ltd on sunday confirmed that a third person has died following a large explosion at a plant in southwestern china on friday that local media have linked to production of apple's ipad 2.
